orchestrator.name: Orchestrator
orchestrator.goal: Coordinate the agents so that they all press their switches simultaneously to unlock the door.

public_information: There is a locked door in the room.
There are three switches: red, green, and blue.
The door unlocks only when all three switches are pressed at the same time.
